message.content:
cs.NE, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.SY

This paper introduces a learning framework for energy-based models using neural computation. Therefore, it is likely to belong to the Neural and Evolutionary Computing (cs.NE) sub-category. Additionally, the paper discusses the gradient computation and learning process, which are relevant to the Learning (cs.LG) and Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI) sub-categories. The paper also mentions the use of the framework in recurrent multi-layer networks, which is relevant to the Computer Vision (cs.CV) sub-category. Finally, the paper discusses the plausibility of the framework being implemented by brains, which is relevant to the Systems and Control (cs.SY) sub-category.
